# UISearchBar.Style.prominent

**Case**

The search bar has a translucent background, and the search field is opaque.

## Declaration

```swift
case prominent
```

## Constants

- **UISearchBar.Style.default**: The search bar has the default style.
- **UISearchBar.Style.minimal**: The search bar has no background, and the search field is translucent.

items.description: The search bar has the default style.
